message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $14,000. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can you consider that?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product!  While $11,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This price reflects the significant value this product will bring to your business.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,500. Can you consider that?
